fragment: Walter White, an underpaid high-school chemistry teacher, becomes a major drug kingpin under the name Heisenberg.
Jesse Pinkman, a former student of Walter White, helps him produce and distribute crystal meth.
Saul Goodman, a criminal lawyer, helps Walter and Jesse with their illegal activities.
Skyler White is Walter's wife and becomes involved in his criminal activities.
Hank Schrader is a DEA agent and Walter's brother-in-law.
Marie Schrader is Skyler's sister and Hank's wife.
Gus Fring is a drug kingpin and a major antagonist in the series.
Mike Ehrmantraut is a private investigator and fixer who becomes involved with Walter and Jesse.
Kim Wexler is Jimmy McGill's love interest and fellow attorney.
Chuck McGill is Jimmy's older brother and a successful lawyer.
Nacho Varga is a cunning criminal and a rival of Jimmy and Mike.
Lalo Salamanca is a charismatic enforcer who helps run his family's drug business.
